params._advancePayment: The amount of PACT that will be given in advance to ImpactLabs

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

AdvancePaymentDecreased(uint256,uint256).notice: Triggered when advancePayment has been decreased

TransferERC20(address,address,uint256).notice: Triggered when an amount of an ERC20 has been transferred from this contract to an address

claim().notice: Transfers PACT to ImpactLabs it will not be transferred PACTs to ImpactLabs until the entire amount payed in advance will be covered

initialize(address,address,address,uint2.notice: Used to initialize a new ImpactLabsVesting contract !!! before calling this method, you must ensure that there is enough PACTs on the contract address

transfer(address,address,uint256).notice: Transfers an amount of an ERC20 from this contract to an address
